verses.roman:
tan-nigrahāya hariṇā
proktā devā yadoḥ kule
avatīrṇāḥ kula-śataṁ
teṣām ekādhikaṁ nṛpa

synonyms: tat—of them; nigrahāya—for the subduing; hariṇā—by Lord Kṛṣṇa; proktāḥ—told; devāḥ—the demigods; yadoḥ—of Yadu; kule—in the family; avatīrṇāḥ—descended; kula—of clans; śatam—one hundred; teṣām—their; eka-adhikam—plus one; nṛpa—O King (Parīkṣit).
translation: To subdue these demons, Lord Hari told the demigods to descend into the dynasty of Yadu. They comprised 101 clans, O King.
